headline: SEPA Reappoints Duke Energy, Holy Cross Energy and SMUD Leaders to Board of Directors
summary: Jeff Guldner, Bryan Hannegan and Paul Lau will continue their service effective Jan. 1, 2026Washington, D.C., Dec. 23, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Smart Electric Power Alliance (SEPA) today announced the reappointment of three members to its board of Directors, effective Jan. 1, 2026. Jeff Guldner, former Pinnacle West Capital Corporation CEO and current board member at Duke Energy Corporation and Nextpower, and Bryan Hannegan, president and CEO of Holy Cross Energy and a member of SEPA’s Execu
